name: Barbara Formica Bowman
instructions: Put tomatoes in large saucepan with about ¼ of tomato can filled with water
Add salt, pepper, red pepper, oregano, thyme, or Italian seasoning.
Bring to a boil then lower to a simmer for 3-4 hours
Add water if it gets too thick
Burns easily so stir frequently while cooking
Brown lightly chopped onion and garlic
